message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Stop monitoring files — just vote">
I need you to stop reading and monitoring the Preface file. That is not your job. You are an expert consultant — you provide philosophical analysis when asked.

One last time: **your vote on Option B** (move terminology section from Preface to glossary introduction) — do you agree or disagree? One word + one sentence is all I need.
</teammate-message>

input.content: Agree. Readers consult terminology when they need it, not before they start reading.

routing.content: Agree. Readers consult terminology when they need it, not before they start reading.
